mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_QnA (QnA_NO, QnA_TITLE, QnA_CONTENTS, REGDATE, USER_NO ) VALUES (SEQ_QNA.nextval, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContents}, SYSDATE, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.QnA_NO, Q.QnA_TITLE, Q.QnA_CONTENTS, Q.REGDATE, Q.HITS, Q.USER_NO, U.USER_NAME FROM TBL_QnA Q, TBL_USER U WHERE Q.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND QnA_NO = #{qnaNo}
SELECT COUNT(qnaNo) FROM TBL_QnA WHERE TBL_QnA >= 0
SELECT COUNT(QnA_NO) FROM TBL_QNA WHERE QnA_NO >= 0
